snippet.title: FIRE the first dreamer – Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Info: https://www.sicgames.co.uk/
Steam Wishlist Here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2136420/FIRE_The_First_Dreamer/

FIRE the first dreamer
Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic journey through over 40 square miles set in the untamed Preseli mountains of Wales. Explore, hunt, unravel ancient mysteries, and summon totem animal magic to ensure humanity’s survival. Inspired by a true story, let the fire guide your dreams in this captivating adventure.
